page.title: 16WELFARE IN SHERIFF HUTTON
page.content: Social concern is very evident in Sheriff Hutton.Church groups have rotas and visit the sick and troubled on a regular basis.Generally people are good neighbours and we have a caring community.Visiting Doctors hold twice weekly surgeries,there is a monthly baby clinic also a chiropidist-all held at the village hall.Good Companions Club meets weekly for the over 55's.A Christmas party organised by church and chapel is held annually for all over 60's of the community,consisting of tea and entertainment.Those too ill or infirm to attend have their meal delivered. The money required to fund this event is raised by holding a bi-annual auction.Sheriff Hutton Charities is a trust administrated by a committee - funds are for educational purposes - also pensioners recieve a donation.
